text: Are you stressed for research and phd application?
yeah... I am kinda unsure. I am really worried because I have no publication yet.
hummm.... then why are you not working on them?
I procrastinate too much... And I can be a little indecisive sometimes. I want to accomplish too much.
I see. Please take care tho! You need to rest.
Thank you for your kindness. I appreciate the reminderâ€”it's easy to get caught up in projects or writing and forget to pause. I'll make sure to balance things better.
